# blastshield_services (Data Source)

Lists Blastshield services with optional filters.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `id` (List of Number) Filter by id.
- `name` (List of String) Filter by name.
- `tags` (List of String) Filter by tags.

### Read-Only

- `services` (Attributes List) List of services matching the filters. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--services))

<a id="nestedatt--services"></a>
### Nested Schema for `services`

Read-Only:

- `id` (Number)
- `name` (String)
- `protocols` (Attributes Set) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--services--protocols))
- `tags` (Map of String)

<a id="nestedatt--services--protocols"></a>
### Nested Schema for `services.protocols`

Read-Only:

- `ip_protocol` (Number)
- `ports` (Set of String)
